custom_utils package¶

Submodules¶

custom_utils.message_notifier module¶

custom_utils.message_notifier.send_notification(to, subject, body, username=None, password=None, smtp_server=None, port=None)¶

Send an email or text notification to the given recipient.

email account from which the email or text will be sent.

param to: str

the subject of the message (Use ‘’ for no subject)

param body: str

the content of the notification message

optional params:
param username: str

the username for the sending email account. If no value is specified, then the value in the user’s system environment is used.

param password: str

the password for the sending email account. If no value is specified, the value in the user’s system environment is used.

param smtp_server: str

The smtp server that will be used to send the message. If no value is specified, then the value in the user’s system environment is used.

param port: int

the port associated with the smtp server. This must be set if the smtp server is set, and vice versa.

Module contents¶

This package contains a set of utility modules that will be used in other projects.

imported modules:

message_notifier

author:

Cassius Jonus
